title: Potato salad Berlin style
ingredients: ['1kg salad potatoes', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon caraway seeds', '2 teaspoons prepared mustard', '3 teaspoons caster sugar', '100ml brine from a pickle jar', '50ml red wine vinegar', '100ml sunflower oil', '1 large onion, minced', '5 gherkins, thinly sliced', '1 tart apple, peeled and finely diced', 'chopped chives to taste']
